FasigTiptonUpdates.Update: 71 PH23 FTFEB FT FEB MIXED 21 update on line 42: + LOVELY REGINA, by Deputy Minister. Unplaced, $1,260. Half-sister to **BERNARDINI** ($3,060,480, champion 3-year-old colt in U.S. (2006), 1st Preakness S. **[G1]** (PIM, $600,000), etc., leading broodmare sire in U.S. (2022)), **Ile de France** ($125,300, 3rd Santa Anita Oaks **[G1]** (SA, $36,000)).
